knimeNode.name: UWW KMeans Clustering
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs k-means clustering with elbow and silhouette analysis.

fullDescription.intro: This node performs k-means clustering algorithm on numerical data. It evaluates multiple values of k and provides WCSS (elbow) and silhouette scores to help determine the optimal number of clusters.
fullDescription.option: The minimum number of clusters to evaluate.
The maximum number of clusters to evaluate.
The number of clusters to use for the final output.

ports.inPort: Table containing numerical data to cluster
ports.outPort: Within-cluster sum of squares for each k
Average silhouette scores for each k
Cluster centroids for each k value
